author: cframpton
msg: Fix mustella so AIR tests will run correctly.  If running mustella from within the sdk and you have AIR_HOME, PLAYERGLOBAL_HOME and FLASHPLAYER_DEBUGGER set in one of the standard ways you do not need to set anything in local.properties other than use_apollo if you want to run the tests with air rather than the player.  A very long time ago air used to be called apollo.  mini_run.sh has no changes other than the code aligned.
